Why list with UK Locksmith Directory?

We are building a transparent ecosystem where customers connect directly with vetted experts.

Direct Customer Contact

Phones ringing, vans on the road. When a customer finds you here, they call your number directly. We do not sit in the middle or route calls through a switchboard.

Review Integrity

We don't hijack your reputation. Your profile links directly to your existing Google Reviews, helping you build authority on the platform that matters most.

Zero Lead Resale

We are not a lead agency. We don't sell the same customer enquiry to 5 different locksmiths causing a race to the bottom on price.

The Verification Roadmap

A simple process designed to keep scammers out and legitimate businesses visible.

Create Account

Name, Email & Password

Identity Verification

Phone OTP & Postcode Check

Required to Publish

Trust Upgrades (Optional)

DBS Check, Insurance, Associations

Frequently Asked Questions

Is there a contract?

No. We believe in earning your business every month. There are no long-term lock-ins or "initial setup charges."

Do you sell leads to other locksmiths?

Never. Customers contact you directly via phone or your website. We are not a directory-buy, not a lead agency.

What if I already have a website?

Perfect! Your directory listing will link directly to your existing site, driving more traffic and improving your local SEO.

How long does verification take?

Basic identity verification is typically completed within 24 hours. Optional trust upgrades (DBS, insurance) may take 2-3 business days depending on document availability.
